name: Name
confirmation: Your request has been received, we will contact you soon.
booking-details: We are excited that you hope to find your wedding dress with us, we will do our best. You will receive an email within 24 hours when a volunteer is avaible at the requested time and date.
info-note: The information provided will only be sent via email and will only be used to contact you and prepare for the appointment.
info-placeholder: Additional information can include if you are pregnant or have a disability that you would like us to be aware of. It can also include if the standard time does not work for you, we will try to adjust it.
email-body:
Dear %name%,

We are excited that you hope to find your wedding dress with us, we will do our best. You will receive an email within 24 hours when a volunteer is avaible at the requested time and date.

Date: %date%
Time Slot: %time-slot%
Name: %name%
Email: %email%
Telephone: %telephone%
City: %city%
Size: %size%
Number of visitors: %visitors%
Additional information: %additional-info%

Best regards,
Bookme - Uit-liefde
